familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $201 - $1,000 in Capital Gains income from Claremount IV Associates LP (Financial Investments; New York, NY) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: Claremount IV Associates LP (Financial Investments; New York, NY)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $201 - $1,000 in Interest Capital Gains income from Claremount IV Associates LP (Financial Investments; New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. This asset has been divested. Income amount is estimated. After having been inadvertently omitted, this underlying asset was added during the ordinary review process with OGE.
familyMemberEthics.business: Claremount IV Associates LP (Financial Investments; New York, NY)
